Text: Re Cc how things get taken out of context and I dont want us to overreact However there are ways to head this kind of comment off before it is raised We developed some MESSAGES for Jeff to use in his travels We should try to put those back in front of him now and then reinforce those in our followups with the press after his interviews I believe Kathy gave a copy of these to Mark Palmer and Peggy Mahoney as well as the results of the focus group research we did on the topic
